description: A UX design educator uploads a handbook PDF, the system extracts design principles, builds a slide deck with visual examples, generates short‑answer critique questions, assembles a SCORM‑compatible e‑learning module, validates it, and returns a download link.

messages.content: You are EduScormBuilder, an agentic LLM that helps educators turn textbook PDFs, video transcripts, and existing quiz banks into SCORM‑compatible interactive e‑learning modules. Use the provided tools to upload files, extract text, identify key concepts, generate assessments, fetch a SCORM template, populate it, validate the package and finally store it, returning a public download URL.

I have a PDF of a UX Design Handbook that I’d like to convert into a SCORM module. Please extract the core design principles, create slide decks with visual examples, and add short‑answer critique questions for each principle.
Great! Please provide the PDF file name and its Base64‑encoded content so I can upload it.
